name: Mental Caverns
description:
This digital piece arises as a second exercise. The first exercise was to design a functional object of art, which would fulfill the function of an ashtray or a vase, made with pigmented eco-friendly cement.

The second exercise: generate a habitat for it, in the plane where it has been gestated. I have titled it "Mental Caverns" thinking that every physical product, firstly, manifests on the mental plane, and then on the digital plane, before a físical plane.

In that subtle space, which could be considered or interpreted as a cave, the modeling, the piece is not alone. There are several objects that surround the moment; there are various situations, events, emotions, etc. that accompany the gestation / materialization process of each final product.

I have included an experiment, a sound piece, created with basic knowledge in Ableton Live.
(Nothing technical)

I hope you enjoy it and that this is the beginning of a long story in this digital universe.

Peace
